hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor

Class Rabbit

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor.Animal
      • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor.Rabbit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Rabbit
extends Animal
    A simple model of a rabbit. Rabbits age, move, breed, and die.
    Author:
    Tsjeard de Winter en Rick van der Poel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rabbit

        public Rabbit(boolean randomAge,
              Field field,
              Location location,
              AbstractModel model)
        Create a new rabbit. A rabbit may be created with age zero (a new born) or with a random age.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the rabbit will have a random age.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.
        model - The model this rabbit should act in.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        This is what the rabbit does most of the time - it runs around. Sometimes it will breed or die of old age.

      • getAge

        public int getAge()
        Returns:
        age of the rabbit

      • checkAndInfect

        public void checkAndInfect()
        A rabbit can get ill with a rabbit virus when rabbits around him got the virus.

      • setInfection

        public void setInfection(boolean infected)
        Set the rabbit to infected
        Parameters:
        infected - true to make this Rabbit sick

      • getSound

        public MusicFile getSound()
        Get the MusicFile that belongs to the hunter
        Returns:
        sound
